author: kkolinko
msg: No need to reallocate CharArrayWriter to clear it. You can call reset().

author: srimanth
msg: AMBARI-1848. Install Wizard, Step 7: Oozie Database Derby option should say "New Derby Database", not "Current Derby Database". (Xi Wang via srimanth)

author: mikem
msg: DERBY-6122 -  InterruptResilienceTest fails with: junit.framework.ComparisonFailure: Database shutdown expected:<[08006]> but was:<[XBDA0]>
The core problem that led to this assert was that an attempt by the
test to shutdown the database timed out with:
Caused by: java.sql.SQLException: Login timeout exceeded.
The test had set a 10 second timeout assuming that was large enough such that
no timeout would be encountered, but failed a few times in public IBM lab
nightly regression runs.  Raising the number to 1000.

author: kkolinko
msg: a) Replace repeated getter calls with a local variable.
b) No need to reallocate CharArrayWriter to clear it. You can call reset().
